product_name: Roxy  Close Out Neoprene Hoody Vest - Women's
long_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the women's Roxy Close Out Neoprene Hoodie Vest offers stylish insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water.
short_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the women's Roxy Close Out Neoprene Hoodie Vest offers stylish insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water.
